channel.title: When I get on server client shuts down
channel.description:
The system cannot find the path specified. Paragon Pkerz is owned by briduforeva
Error: T1 - 123,0 - 36,36 # # A fatal error has been detected by the Java Runtime Environment: # # EXCEPTION_ACCESS_VIOLATION (0xc0000005) at pc=0x000000006d847786, pid=4332, t id=1228 # # JRE version: 6.0_21-b07 # Java VM: Java HotSpot(TM) 64-Bit Server VM (17.0-b17 mixed mode windows-amd64 ) # Problematic frame: # V [jvm.dll+0x57786] # # An error report file with more information is saved as: # C:\Users\Kitchen\Desktop\MTP V2 Client\hs_err_pid4332.log # # If you would like to submit a bug report, please visit: # http://java.sun.com/webapps/bugreport/crash.jsp # Press any key to continue . . .
_____
I get this error. I can log on for a few seconds but then this happens. Help is great appreciated! Thanks!
